description: There are actually a bunch of Pokemon text faces and since I’m a huge fan of Pokemon, they get to have their own section. Naturally, Pikachu comes first and he even has two different text faces. Find other famous Pokemon, like the big ol’ snoring Snorlax (go ahead, add some zz’s!), or Muk, who’s mouth is wide open in that classic, “muuuuuuuuk” sound. These emoticons really go to show how creative you can get with creating your favourite characters. title: Pokemon
